detail_desc: Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Kids Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy. Adjustable straps with press-studs, open leg pockets and press-studs at the waist. Lined at the top.
Cotton cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
V-neck jersey T-shirt in a stretch cotton blend. Slim fit.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Unlined.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with a text print, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Large scarf in a wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x200 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking over the bust, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a motif on the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Cap with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Blouse in cotton seersucker with a square neckline with elastication and a frill trim and short, elasticated, frill-trimmed sleeves with a decorative bow.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and contrasting colour side stripes.
Cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front, short raglan sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorter jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.

Dungaree shorts in washed denim with adjustable straps with a press-stud and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides. Fake pockets and belt loops at the front, one back pocket and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Platform sandals in soft suede with an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 4 cm.
Hooded top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, lined hood, frill-trimmed kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Lightweight, 3/4-length sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Slip-on mesh trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with a gentle V-neck at the front, low-cut back, wide shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side, side pockets and wide legs.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Long, raglan sleeves with gathered seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slingbacks in twill with decorative beads and sequins at the front and a strap around the ankle that is elasticated at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels 7.5 cm. The polyester content of the shoes is recycled.
Short jersey skirt with ties at the waist, a concealed zip and button at one side and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric in a jacquard pattern with a racer back. Seamless.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Braided headband in a soft knit.

Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with pleats at the top, and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a decorative metal buckle, a concealed zip in one side and a slit at the back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulder and at the crotch.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave. Picot trim around the neckline and the lapped shoulders, and press-studs at the crotch.
Round-necked T-shirt in airy linen jersey.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with narrow shoulder straps, a sequined bodice and a zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a super-flared skirt in several layers of tulle, the top layer with sequined shell appliqués. Lined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets at the front and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Small, cylindrical bag in sturdy imitation leather with glitter and an appliqué. Flap with a zip around it and a fabric cord as a shoulder strap with a press-stud on one side. Lined. Height approx. 16 cm. Diameter approx. 8 cm.
Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Printed top with press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Knee-length shorts in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with long puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the neckline.
Kaftan in an airy weave with buttons down the front and high slits in the sides.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, welt pockets in the side seams and tapered legs.
Leggings in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Round metal earrings with hoop pendants. Length 3.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Knee socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sleeveless top in a silk crêpe weave in a wide, gently flared style with a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy satin with a sheen. Fitted bodice with a slightly wider neckline, a concealed zip at the back and a flared, voluminous skirt. Lined at the top.
Padded sleep mask with an elastic strap at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Headband in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a knot detail at the front.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with side pockets and elastication at the back of the waist.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Cable-knit jumper in a cotton blend. Wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in a fine-knit mohair and wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs. No buttons.
